TimeoutException().Description: Constructs a TimeoutException with no specified detail message.

TimeoutException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs a TimeoutException with the specified detail message.

ClassDesc: Exception thrown when a blocking operation times out. Blocking operations for which a timeout is specified need a means to indicate that the timeout has occurred. For many such operations it is possible to return a value that indicates timeout; when that is not possible or desirable then TimeoutException should be declared and thrown.
